title: How are front-end and back-end connected? - Quora

response.answer_text: Front end and Backend of the application is connected through API or Application Programming interface. In this you may have a question what is an API, simple an API or Application Programming Interface is a piece of software that make interactions to the client and server. APIs are stands between the request and response cycle. I have written an article on my blog if you want the complete pictorial and more explanation you can visit our website www.polytechnica.me
